thread.title: A nice, small, hotel in Paris
thread.title_full: A nice, small, hotel in Paris - Review of Hotel Mistral, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Steingard
title: A nice, small, hotel in Paris
text:
As others have mentioned..., yes my room was not spacious either.
But the room was clean, with a refrigerator, garden wiew and the bed was comfortable.
The breakfast area is a lovely little spot, with a wiew into the backyard / garden, which brings in daylight and gives the room a nice atmosphere between inside and outside.
From an overall point of wiew, hotel seems to be well maintained.
The hotel is close to the Metro station Gait√©.
This hotel served me well, and I would love to come back sometime. :-)
